p: Using the DF as a case study, the aim of the research is to analyze how the Brazilian Dengue surveillance system operates, focusing on the functioning of data collection and reporting, and on the integration of epidemiological and environmental data. Clarity over the functioning of dengue surveillance might help to improve data reporting, optimize resources and ultimately prevent the spread of outbreaks. The underlying research questions are: how is the dengue surveillance system in District Federal functioning? Which are the main strengths and weaknesses of the dengue surveillance system?
